messageBody:
Craig Dickson wrote:

> We have been asked to make sure that all pages of our Web Application
> conform to a particular DTD (in this case it is XHTML 1.0), and while we
> will make our best efforts during development, we would like to add some
> tests to our JUnit suite to verify this.
>
> Anyone know of any projects that work with JUnit that have this built in
> so we don't have to start form scratch writing some kind of XML
> validation test?

All you need to do is instantiate an XML parser with validation enabled,
then attempt to parse your XML documents one by one. I recommend using
the Parameterized Test Case pattern for that, since you likely want to
parse each document in its own test. (_JUnit Recipes_, recipe 4.8)

There's probably no project that has extracted this for reuse, because
there's almost nothing to it. If you need help on the details, ask us or
try out the Yahoo! group VirtualPair.

Take care.
